description: Building access via Twilio and a serial fax/dial-up modem

scripts.deploy: yarn sync && ssh star-haven -- sh -c "'cd ~/door-control && docker build . -t door-control && (docker container rm -f door-control || true) && docker run --device /dev/ttyACM0 -e TTY_PATH=/dev/ttyACM0 -v ~/door-control/.env:/door-control/.env --restart unless-stopped --name door-control -d door-control'"
